faqItems.q: Where are you based?
faqItems.a: We are based in Chennai, Tamil Nadu, India.

faqItems.q: Are you available on WhatsApp for inquiries or orders?
faqItems.a: Yes, we are available on WhatsApp for customer inquiries and orders.

faqItems.q: Can I inquire about books or products not listed?
faqItems.a: Absolutely! Please reach out to us through WhatsApp, and we will do our best to procure them for you.

faqItems.q: Do you accept bulk or return gift orders?
faqItems.a: Yes, we do! Please share your requirements and budget, and we will confirm if it is feasible.

faqItems.q: How can I place an order?
faqItems.a: You can place an order by sending us a direct message on Instagram or WhatsApp. Please include the product name and quantity.

faqItems.q: Which locations do you deliver to?
faqItems.a: As of now, we deliver across India. If you are looking for overseas delivery, please contact us to check feasibility.

faqItems.q: What shipping methods do you use?
faqItems.a: We primarily ship via India Post or other trusted courier services.

faqItems.q: How long does shipping take?
faqItems.a: Shipping typically takes 3-7 business days, depending on your location. For expedited shipping, please contact us to check feasibility.

faqItems.q: Will I receive a tracking ID for my order?
faqItems.a: Yes, once your order is dispatched, you will receive a tracking ID to monitor your delivery status.

faqItems.q: What are the shipping costs?
faqItems.a: Shipping costs depend on the size, weight, location, and the shipping method chosen for your order.

faqItems.q: What payment methods do you accept?
faqItems.a: We accept UPI payment and bank transfer. Detailed payment instructions will be provided once you confirm your order.

faqItems.q: Do you offer cash on delivery?
faqItems.a: No, we do not offer cash on delivery. Please choose from the other available payment methods.

faqItems.q: What is your return policy?
faqItems.a: We do not accept returns. Please ensure you review the product videos we send before confirming your order.

faqItems.q: What age groups are your kids' books suitable for?
faqItems.a: Our collection caters to all age groups, from toddlers to young adults. Feel free to reach out for specific recommendations.

faqItems.q: Are your books educational?
faqItems.a: Yes, we offer both educational and recreational books to suit a wide range of interests and learning needs.

faqItems.q: Do you provide preloved and new books?
faqItems.a: Yes, we offer both preloved and new books. Please check the book details before placing your order.

faqItems.q: Do you offer books for adults?
faqItems.a: Yes, we do! Please visit our Chasmish Reads section for more.

faqItems.q: What types of toys do you offer?
faqItems.a: We offer a variety of toys, including educational toys, puzzles, board games, Rubik's cubes, and more.

faqItems.q: What educational toys do you provide?
faqItems.a: Our range includes puzzles, building blocks, science kits, and interactive learning games.

faqItems.q: Can I get a bookshelf customized to my needs?
faqItems.a: Yes, we offer custom wooden bookshelves tailored to your specifications.

faqItems.q: Do you provide bookshelves made from materials other than wood?
faqItems.a: Yes, we also offer plastic bookshelves. Let us know your requirements, and we’ll arrange something suitable.

faqItems.q: What genres of novels do you offer?
faqItems.a: We provide a wide selection of genres, including fiction, non-fiction, mystery, romance, fantasy, and more.

faqItems.q: Do you offer book recommendations?
faqItems.a: Yes, we’d be happy to suggest books based on your preferences!

faqItems.q: What stationery products do you offer under your brand?
faqItems.a: We design and sell custom stationery, including journals, notebooks, planners, calendars, and bookmarks.

faqItems.q: Do you offer personalized stationery?
faqItems.a: Currently, we do not provide personalization options.
